Please check your internet settings 2/23/12 typingMessage … 12–12–12 play_or_download Sorry not yet a member of any group Invalid verification token Invite Today Yesterday Nothing to display Image size exceeds 8MB Invalid image Not a bitmap Add custom number You can add other users who are not in your contacts by adding their numbers directly.\n They only have to be registered members of PairApp. It\'s that simple! :-) New Message message here… Name, e.g Brothers From One Hood remove attachment Send to… can\'t forward, file not found Unknown Listen,You currently don\'t have anyone in your \ contacts who uses PairApp.\n\n Quickly invite them to have a nice experience LISTEN, YOU CURRENTLY DON\'T HAVE ANYONE IN YOUR CONTACTS USING PAIRAPP,\n\n QUICKLY INVITE THEM FOR A NICE CHAT EXPERIENCE Search or Add custom number @string/app_name Number added successfully. click \'done\' when you are done A group can start with minimum of 3 ( including you ) members You will be a member automatically after creating this group This number has already been added This user is already a member You are already a member Group names can only end with a letter Group names can only start with a letter Group names can not be less than 30 letters Group names can not be less than 5 letters Would you like to add the number in the text box before proceeding?
